Articles.Content: Does the Pre-cooler really cool down engines, does it even do anything than an inline air intake?

There have been a great number of threads on this topic over time. The general consensus is that it's just a neat-looking part that combines some useful features into one. It doesn't actually provide active cooling.

(It does, however, have among the highest emissive constants of all parts in the game, meaning that heat that somehow ends up in it will passively radiate into space faster than usual. Which only really matters in space, since inside an atmosphere, convective cooling far outstrips blackbody radiation.)
